#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <iterator>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int n, i, sum = 0;
	
	while( scanf("%d", &n ) > 0 ) {
	
	vector<int> A( n );
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
		scanf("%d", &A[ i ] );
	
	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
		sum += A[ i ];
	
	reverse( A.begin(), A.end() );

	for( i = 0;i < n;i++ )
		printf("%d ", A[ i ] );
		
	printf("\n%d\n", sum );
	
	}
	return 0;
}
